mapper.select: /*getAccountInfo*/ select seq , symbol , address , tag , memo , start_block as startBlock , end_block as endBlock , page , transfer_page as transferPage , complete from coinone_neo_account where complete = 'N' limit 5

/*getTransactionInfoOne*/ select symbol , target_address as addr , nonce , from_address as 'from' , to_address as 'to' , sequence as 'sequence' , hash , contract , block , amount , fee , is_valid as 'isValid' , id_deposit as 'isDeposit' , type as 'type' , unit , block_time as 'created_at' from coinone_${tableSymbol}_tx where 1=1
and target_address = #{address} order by seq desc limit 1
mapper.insert: /*putBlockTransaction*/ INSERT INTO coinone_${tableSymbol}_tx ( symbol, target_address, nonce, from_address, to_address, tag, sequence, hash, contract, block, amount, fee, is_valid, id_deposit, block_time, type, unit ) VALUES ( #{symbol}, #{addr}, #{nonce}, #{from}, #{to}, #{tag}, #{sequence}, #{hash}, #{contract}, #{block}, #{amount}, #{fee}, #{isValid}, #{isDeposit}, #{created_at}, #{type}, #{unit} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE modified_date = now()
